page.title: 08ATWORTH AT PLAY
page.content: RECREATION_EVENTS. The Atworth Recreational ground is well used for private and organised sport and village events. The Atworth Village Fete is an annual event based mainly on the Recreational ground,involving a large part of the community.A week of village events culminates in Fete day where a football competition,9 pin bowling on grass and various displays compete with a beer tent and other refreshments for peoples attention.The St Johns Ambulance Brigade provides First Aid for the casualties. Another Annual event is the Traction and Steam Rally held in the weekend of August Bank Holiday.This attracts exhibitors from a wide area.
